text: Club de Regatas Vasco da Gama also known as Vasco da Gama or simply Vasco, is a Brazilian professional sports club based in Rio de Janeiro, in the neighborhood of São Cristovão. Although it competes in a number of different sports, Vasco is mostly known for its football team. ==League title== *Série B : 1 **2009 ==References== Category:Football clubs in Rio de Janeiro Category:1898 establishments Category:1890s establishments in Brazil
title: Club de Regatas Vasco da Gama
